term_definitions.items: Атрибуты, обязательные для всех документов СИМИ
документ введен в систему и не подлежит изменениям
документ не может использоваться для принятия клинических решений (не доступен для пользователей)
диагноз установлен в предыдущем году или ранее

*Any physical object, product, instrument, apparatus, appliance, material or other item used directly or indirectly in the provision of healthcare, but is not used primarily through therapeutic or metabolic means.(en)
*Identification of the device. This is very likely to be a coded field, including pre- or post-coordianted details.(en)
*Date that the device/product is no longer fit for use.(en)
*Additional narrative about the device not captured in other fields.(en)
*Details about safety feature(s) of the device.(en)
*Type of safety feature of the device.(en)
*Description of the safety feature of the device.(en)
*Size of device - a choice of value types is offered - count, quantity or text.(en)
*Details about the components of the device.(en)
*Named anatomical location - ideally would be coded where possible.(en)
*Qualifier to identify which direction the anatomical location is in relation to the identified landmark.(en)
*In the sagittal plane passing through the midline of the body.(en)
*Relative location inferior and medial to the landmark.(en)
*Relative location superior and lateral to the landmark.(en)
*Relative location inferior and medial to the landmark.(en)
*Relative location superior and medial to the landmark.(en)

*Qualifiers to identify non-specific location eg 5cm (distance) inferior (aspect) to the tibial tuberosity (landmark). There may be more than one relative location required to provide a cross reference.(en)
*Identified anatomical landmark from which to specify relative anatomical location.(en)
*Distance of location from the identified landmark.(en)
*Line describing the position of a vertical anatomical plane in the body.(en)
*In the sagittal plane passing through mid-clavical.(en)
*In the coronal plane passing through mid-axilla.(en)
*In the sagittal plane passing through mid-scapula.(en)
*Identify the specific anatomical site out of multiple eg tenth rib; fourth vertebra; second toe.(en)
*Image or images used to identify a location.(en)
*Description of any visual markings used to orientate the viewer e.g external reference points, special sutures, ink markings.(en)
*Details of the device to be used.(en)
*The anatomical site at which the treatment should be applied(en)
*Generic request for a range of different healthcare services e.g referral, lab request, equipment request.(en)
*The local ID assigned to the order by the healthcare provider or organisation requesting the service. This is also referred to as Placer Order Identifier.(en)
*The ID assigned to the order by the healthcare provider or organisation receiving the request for service. This is also referred to as Filler Order Identifier.(en)
*The date and time that the service should be performed or completed.(en)
*A short description of the reason for the request. This is often coded with an external terminology.(en)
*A narrative description explaining the reason for request.(en)
*Stated intent of the request by the referrer.(en)
*True indicates that additional information has been identified and will be forwarded when available eg incomplete pathology test results.(en)
*Details of the nature of supplementary information that is to follow e.g name of laboratory results.(en)
*Local detailed information such as billing requirements.(en)
*Language, transport or other personal requirements to support the patient's attendance or participation in provision of the service.(en)
*Identification of the service requested. This is often coded with an external terminology.(en)

*The status of the request for service as indicated by the requester. Status is used to denote whether this is the initial request, or a follow-up request to change or provide supplementary information.(en)
*A list of person's or organisation who should receive copies of any communication.(en)
*Structured detail defining the service requested eg CLUSTER archetype specifying the specific catheter that is to be inserted.(en)
*A detailed narrative description of the service requested.(en)
*Details about the healthcare provider or organisation requesting the service.(en)
*Details about the healthcare provider or organisation receiving the request for service.(en)
*The latest date that is acceptable for the service to be completed.(en)
диагноз установлен в предыдущем году или ранее
диагноз установлен в предыдущем году или ранее
диагноз установлен в предыдущем году или ранее
направлен на консультацию в др. ЛПУ
Номер стационара, в который госпитализируется пациент
